inn1.comm: down the leg side and plays it fine, but it is off the pad, for couple of  leg byes.
good length delivery and defended watchfully to the off side.
on the pads and he flicks it nicely through square leg to the fence for the first boundary of the innings.
good length delivery pitches and straightens, gets the leading edge and goes square of the wicket on the off side.
again on the pads, hits high on the thigh and goes behind square leg.
pitches and comes in, tucks it to long leg for a single.
short and wide outside the off stump and Chibhabha checks his shot, went for it and gets beaten.
back of a length delivery and Chibhabha gets behind the delivery and defends to the off side.
again too wide outside the off stump, left alone.
back of a length delivery and Chibhabha turns it to the onside.
stays in the crease and pushes to mid-on.
outside the off stump and left alone through to the keeper.

short ball and Bangladesh get the first breakthrough. Chibhabha goes for the pull and gets a top edge behind the wicket on the off side, Mushfiqur Rahim calls for it and settles under it to take the catch.
works it through midwicket for couple of runs.
on the middle and leg, worked to the onside.
lovely delivery outside the off stump, pitches and moves away to beat the outside edge.
short of a good length delivery angled down the leg side, tucks it around the corner to long leg for a single.
pushes to mid-on straight to the fielder.
cuts in and he tucks it down to fine leg for a single.
turns it down to long leg for a single.
a beauty from Shafiul, pitches on a length and shapes away to beat the outside edge, an unplayable delivery.
gets behind the delivery this time and blocks it down on the track.
turned away to the onside to midwicket.
defends to the off side.
works it down to fine leg for a single.
punches off the back foot square of the wicket on the off side.
stands in the crease and punches to point.
cut away nicely behind point and no stopping that, lot of width to play with.
defended to the onside, stays in the crease.
plays behind point for a single.
struggling once again, strays down the leg side and Taylor just had to get some bat on it and goes to the fence for a boundary.
cut behind point straight to the fielder.
short ball and he was too late for the pull, miscues to the onside.
taps it down to third man for a single.
nips back in and he plays to the onside.
on the front foot and driven nicely through backward point to the fence.
wonderful shot from Taylor, moves forward with the shot and times it well through extra cover and in the gap to the fence.
defended solidly to the off side.
defended to the onside.
turns it through square leg for a single.
defended square of the wicket on the off side.
defended down the track.
drives it down the ground to long off for a single.
good tight stuff from Razzak, defended to the off side.
starts off with an arm ball, inside edges onto the pad.
sweeps to deep square leg and picks up couple of runs.
good ball and coming in, defended watchfully to the off side.
turns it through square leg and picks up a single.
pushes down the ground to long off.
another single down the ground to long off.
punches to the off side.
comes on with the arm and strikes the pad, loud appeal and not given.
defended down the track.
swept down to deep backward square leg for a single.
pushes it back to the bowler.
moves back and cuts well through backward point and no one in the deep on the off side.
looking to loft it down the ground, miscues it high in the air and mid-on chasing it could not get to it.
punches it off the back foot to mid-off.
pushes to the right of mid-on for a single.
comes forward and defends square of the wicket on the off side.
turns it to the onside to square leg.
Shakib strikes for Bangladesh, Taylor steps down the track and looking to go over extra cover but could not get the height and Raqibul at extra cover latches on to it.
pushes to mid-off and there is a mix-up, the throw from fielder misses the stumps, would have been gone.
cut hard to point.
sweeps and gets a top-edge behind the wicket on the onside, Tamim goes for it and drops it.
defended.
defends to the off side.
moves forward and pushes to mid-on.
works it down to fine leg for a single.
moves back and punches it through the onside to the deep.
makes room and cuts from close to the stumps behind point to the deep, plays it late.
moves forward and drives, was there a edge as Rahim appeals loudly, turned down by the umpire.
defended to the onside.
comes forward and defends to mid-off.
sweeps and gets an edge, was too far for the sweep.
moves forward and defends to the off side.

lovely bowling from Razzak, tosses it up nicely on the off stump and Chakabva looking to drive through the off side, the turn on the delivery beats the outside edge and he drags his feet out of the crease, quick work from Rahim, who collects the ball and whips off the bails.
lets it go outside the off stump.
another leave outside the off stump.
tossed up outside the off stump, left alone.
defended to the onside.
moves back and cuts to point.
moves forward and pushes forward of point to the deep for a single.
on the middle and leg, Taibu comes forward and presses it to midwicket
on the middle stump and flighted a little more this time. Taibu comes down the track and punches it to long-on for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Taibu comes forward and drives it to extra-cover, where a good piece of fielding prevents a single
comes forward and defends it to the off side
short outside the off stump. Taibu cuts it to point and sets off for a quick single. There were cries of excitement from the fielders but Dabengwa was well in
fuller outside the off stump. Dabengwa turns it to square-leg
pushes it back to the bowler
fuller outside the off stump. Taibu comes down the track and drives it to mid-on. He runs with momentum and has to scramble his way back into the crease as there was no run in it
fuller on the middle and leg. Taibu pushes it to mid-on for a single
fuller outside the off stump. Dabengwa drives it back to the bowler
good length ball on the off stump. Dabengwa comes forward and defends
fuller outside the off stump and flighted. Dabengwa opens the face of the bat as he pushes it to short third man
good length on the middle stump. Dabengwa defends it back onto the pitch
short outside the off stump. Taibu comes forward and cuts it to cover
outside the off stump. Taibu comes forward and defends
on the middle and leg. Taibu moves across and forces it away to leg side for a single
on the off stump. Dabengwa comes forward and turns it to the leg side. There is some excitement again as Rahim is rushing the fielders to throw the ball back to him
outside the off stump. Dabengwa comes forward and pushes it to point
outside the off stump, Dabengwa defends
on the middle and leg. Taibu defends it to the leg side
fuller on the middle and leg. Taibu comes forward and presses it back onto the pitch
fuller on the middle stump, Taibu pushes it back to the bowler
fuller on the middle and leg. Taibu drives it straight, so straight that it hits the stumps at the other end. Naeem did not get any part of the hand onto it
short outside off. Taibu defends it back to the bowler
good length ball outside off. Taibu defends
uses his feet and defends down the track.
plays it behind point.
uses his feet and takes it on the full, one bounce to the fielder at extra cover.
defended to the off side.
comes down the track and pushes it back to the bowler, who throws it back to the keeper, who gets rid of the stumps.
sweeps from outside the off stump to fine leg for a single.
too far for the sweep, stretches out to it and mistimes to the onside.
moves back and punches through extra cover.
turns it to the onside to midwicket.
too slow in the air and Taibu has a lot of time, he reverse sweeps through point for a single.

sweeps it well behind square leg to the deep, Mashrafe desperately tries to push the ball back in play but he seems to have touched the ropes, the third umpire takes a long time to check that, not a boundary says the umpire.
swept down to short fine leg.
swept behind square leg for a single.
defended with an angled bat to the off side.
down the track and pushes to mid-on for a single.
sweeps to deep square leg for a single.
makes room and cuts to deep backward point.
punches to mid-off for a single.
Taibu is forzen for a moment, first get to reverse sweep and then lets the ball go through to the keeper.
turns it to the onside.
looking to work it through the onside, takes it on the pad and a loud shout, turned down.
punches it down the ground to long on.
sweeps and misses, the ball tossed up outside the off stump.
spins away slowly, dabs it to the off side.
looking to drag it from outside the off stump, plays it behind square leg.
quicker delivery and Dabengwa is uncertain.
sweeps in the air and behind square leg to the fence for a boundary.
uses his feet and works to midwicket.
moves back and punches square of the wicket on the off side.
plays to the off side to point.
sweeps it behind square leg, Razzak scores a direct hit, the umpire refers upstairs, green light comes on, the batsman was well in.
reverse sweeps to deep backward point.
quicker delivery and looking to work it through the onside, misses the bat and strikes the pad, loud appeal, turned down.
moves forward and pushes to mid-off.
reverse sweeps, was there an edge onto the pad, question asked and the umpire says no.
moves back and works to the onside.
looking to work it to the onside, gets a leading edge over the bowler and goes to mid-off.
uses his feet and works to the onside.
turned away to the onside for a quick single.
uses his feet and works it wide of mid-on to the deep, couple of runs taken.
moves back and makes room and punches it through the off side for a single.
uses his feet and hits in the air for a moment, drops short of the bowler.
driven to the off side.
sweeps from outside the off stump to deep backward square leg.
tossed up wide outside the off stump, Taibu looking for the reverse sweep,  lets it go.
another reverse sweep, too early for it and he waits for it and then plays it to deep point, the bowler sees it and he bowls it to him.
comes forward and gets beaten by the turn.
sweeps behind square leg.
defended to the onside.
excellent fielding by Shakib as the  ball was driven to him.
moves back and works it down the ground to long on.
fires it in outside the off stump, sweeps and misses.
moves back and plays it with an angled bat behind point.
gets the under edge, almost dragged it on.
uses his feet and drives down the ground to long off.
cuts very late to deep backward point.
moves back and cuts behind point.
sweeps to deep backward square leg for a single.
sweeps excellently, through square leg and hit very hard to the fence for a boundary.
defended down the track.
sweeps to short fine leg.

worked to square leg and the batsmen go for a quick single, the throw comes in to the keeper, who collects the ball and gets rid of the stumps and Taibu dives desperately to reach the crease, referred to the third umpire, to check the if the bat was in the air, the green light comes on.
pushed to mid-on for a single.
gets a thickish edge to short fine leg.
comes down the track and hits in the air just wide of the bowler to mid-off.
cut behind point.
gets the outside edge and goes to the fence for a boundary.
looking to work it through the onside as he comes down the track, taken on the pad.
moves back and punches it down the track.
moves forward and plays to cover.
full toss driven back in the air to the left of Shaikb who takes it well to send back Dabengwa, Shakib picks up a wicket immediately in his second spell.
makes room and cuts straight to the fielder at point.
sweeps in the air to deep square leg.
lovely shot from Ervine, punches off the back foot and in the gap through extra cover to the fence for a much needed boundary.
punches off the back foot to the sweeper.
defended to the off side.
Taibu and his sweep, plays to short fine leg.
drives to mid-off.
uses his feet and works to midwicket.
tossed up and driven down the ground to long off for a single.
sweeps along the ground to deep square leg.
comes forward and defends to the off side.
comes forward and defends to the onside.
comes forward and defends down the track.
turned to the onside.
comes forward and defends to the off side.
comes forward and sweeps, gets a top edge and the ball lands safely.
defended to the off side.
Taibu goes, too many of the reverse sweeps, falls to one, misses a reverse sweep and gets hit on the pad, loud appeal and this time the umpire nods in the favor of the bowler, good stuff.
moves forward and drives down the ground to long off.
driven back and excellent fielding.
turns and works it to the onside.
comes forward and pushes to the onside.
tossed up outside the off stump, moves forward to the pitch off the ball and drives well through extra cover to the fence.
turns to the onside.
uses his feet and drives down the ground to long on.
cuts to the sweeper on the off side.
works it to the onside for a single.
comes forward and defends to the off side.
driven through the vacant off side to the sweeper for a single.
played back to the bowler.
down the track and takes it on the full, driven down the ground to long on.
comes forward and pushes to extra cover.
down the track and takes it on the full and drives to mid-on.
turns it behind square leg.
comes forward and drives through the off side.
worked to the onside, misfield and Shakib is angry.
reverse sweeps to backward point, straight to the fielder.
too short from Shakib, launches it in the air wide of long on to the fence.
keeps a touch low, pushes to the off side.

Shakib again picks up a wicket, first over of his third spell, the arm ball keeps a touch low and Chigumbura looking to launch it over the fence at midwicket, misses it completely and the sound of timber. Zimbabwe innings falling apart.
short ball and Ervine mistimes the pull to the onside.
works it forward of square leg to the deep, Mashrafe rushes in and a terrible throw to the keeper.
fuller and worked through midwicket, the batsmen are coming back for the second, Kayes puts in a throw and scores a direct hit, not referred to the third umpire. That was out.
plays it down to third man for a single.
defended to the off side to cover.
tucks it around the corner behind square leg for a single.
reverse sweep fetches a boundary, down to third man fence.
gets beaten and the keeper fails to catch it.
worked to the onside.
comes forward and defends down the track.
tossed up bit wide outside the off stump and Utseya lets it go.
comes forward and defends down the track.
lovely delivery right in the block-hole, squeezed out to the off side.
full toss down the leg side, signaled a wide.
excellently played, short outside the off stump and Utseya waits for it and delicately plays it down to third man fence.
gets behind the delivery and defends to the off side.
steers it down to third man for a single.
slower off the track and Ervine laps it behind square leg to the deep.
bouncer and through to the keeper.
pushes to the off side.
works it to the right of short fine leg for a single.
uses his feet and takes it on the pad.
full toss swept to deep square leg.
sweeps and misses through to the keeper.
driven through the off side to deep extra cover.
down the track and pushes to mid-on.
makes room and cuts but straight to extra cover.
too short from Shuvo and Utseya moves back and pulls well in the air to midwicket fence for a boundary.
moves back and punches to the left of long off and coming back for the second, the throw was wide from Shafiul.
short once again and Utseya on the back foot pulls and this time well over the midwicket fence for a six.
looking for the reverse sweep, misses the bat and strikes the pad outside the line, appeal turned down.
plays behind square leg for a single.
fires it in and follows Utseya, who looks to give some room, misses and takes it on the pad.
swings it high in the air to the vacant deep midwicket and the ball stops before the boundary ropes, a mix-up but the throw is terrible once again.
swept down to short fine leg.
quicker down the leg side, Rahim collects the ball and whips off the bails but  the batsman's feet is grounded.
driven through cover for a single.
driven to mid-off for a quick single.
uses his feet and looking to work it through the onside, off the pad.
makes room and cuts to the sweeper.
reverse sweeps and does it well, to the backward point fence for a boundary.
tucks it around the corner behind square leg for a single.
fires it down the leg side, off the pad to fine leg.
sweeps to deep backward square leg.
down the leg side, signaled a wide.
moves across his stumps to the off side and then slaps it down the ground to long off.
reverse sweeps to short third man.
one bounce to the fence, tossed up delivery and Utseya launches it in the air to the midwicket fence for a boundary.
tries once again for the big shot, makes room and hits in the air down the ground to long off and picks out Naeem Islam, who accepts the catch. Utseya goes after a good partnership with Ervine.
pushes down the ground through mid-on.
comes forward and defends to the off side.
Shakib strikes once again, a full toss and a nothing shot, played in the air back to Shakib, who accepts it gleefully. Shakib picking up wickets at crucial times.
mistimes the drive back down the track.
pushes to the onside to midwicket.
works it through square leg for a single and Price gets off the mark.

Razzak picks up his fourth wicket, Price moves across his stumps to a straight delivery and looks to work it through the onside, misses it and the ball strikes the pad in front of the stumps, loud appeal and given by the umpire.
Razzak picks up a hat-trick, Zimbabwe are all out for 191. Razzak fires it in and strikes full on the pad as Mpofu looks to defend, loud appeal and given. Five wickets for him, wondeful bowling.

inn2.comm: pushes for a single.
plays it back down the track.
defends on the front foot to the off side.
moves back and works it behind square leg.
works it through the onside to deep midwicket, a fuller delivery.
gets the behind the delivery and blocks it to the onside.
cut away hard but straight to the fielder at point, width not capitalized.
a touch short and Tamim mistimes the pull to the onside, was in the air but no fielder around.
moves forward and opens the face off the bat and plays to deep backward point for a single.
tucks it behind square leg for an easy single.
spins down the leg side, signaled a wide.
another one goes down the leg side.
makes room and mistimes the cut to the off side.
goes all the way over extra cover fence, dances down the track and lofts it high and dry for a six.
pushes to the off side.
played to the onside.
stays on the front foot and pushes to mid-off.
gets behind the delivery and shows the full face off the bat and defends to mid-off.
plays with an angled bat behind point to the deep.
defends to the off side.
down the track and looking to pull, gets the toe end of the bat and goes to the off side to mid-off, the ball not coming on to the bat.
off the pad behind square leg.
slower delivery and worked forward of square leg to the deep.
comes forward and defends, gets a thickish edge to the onside.
comes forward and defends to the onside.
makes room and cuts hard through point to the fence for a boundary.
swept to deep backward square leg for a single.
lovely shot from Tamim, dances down the track and hits in the air and in the gap wide of mid-off to the fence for a boundary.
driven back to the bowler.
edge and gone, lovely delivery from Mpofu, pitches short of a length and takes off, Kayes follows the delivery and gets the edge through to Taibu.
tucks it around the corner behind square leg and Price fumbles, gives away a single.
slower delivery pitches outside the leg stump and strikes the pad as Tamim looks to work it through the onside.
turns it behind square leg and picks up a single.
dropped a sitter by Chigumbura, driven in the air straight to him at mid-off and he makes a mess of it.
quick bouncer and through to Taibu. Mpofu appeals don't know for what and then he has few words with Siddique.
lovely delivery first up, defends on the front foot, gets the top off the bat.
stands in the crease and punches to mid-off.
outside the off stump and left alone.
good ball, Tamim looking to drive it down the ground, mistimes it.
moves back and punches it through mid-on for a single.
gets a thickish edge behind square leg to the deep.
fuller delivery driven straight back down the track and hits the stumps at the non-strikers end.
slower delivery down the leg side and Tamim plays it fine past the short fine leg fielder to the fence for a boundary.
another bad delivery, down the leg side and Tamim tickles it fine to the fence for the second boundary.
comes forward to a good length delivery and defends back to the bowler.
moves forward and mistimes the drive to mid-off.
plays it to the onside.
looking to drive through the off side, gets a thickish edge down to third man.
drives on the front foot to mid-off.
pushes gently through mid-on for a single.
inside edges to the off side.
clips it to the onside.
outside the off stump and left alone.
on the pads and tucked through square leg to the deep.
lovely shot from Siddique, stands in the crease and times it well, punches it through cover and the ball races to the fence.
slower delivery defended to the off side.
slower delivery turned to the onside.
played with an angled bat behind point.
short ball and Tamim pulls in the air to deep midwicket, there is fielder in the deep.
fuller delivery worked to the onside to midwicket.
mistimes the cut to the off side, the ball coming slowly off the track.
full and outside the off stump, drives beautifully through the off side, through extra cover to the fence.
turns to the onside for a single.
width outside the off stump, this time he cuts hard forward of point to the fence for a boundary.
fuller delivery and driven, Meth gets an hand to it, goes to mid-on.
pushed back to the bowler.
moves forward and defends with an angled bat to point.
stays in the crease and defends to the off side.
moves back and punches to the fielder at extra cover.
pushes to the onside.
moves back and plays it back to the bowler.
cut hard to point, well fielded by Ervine.
driven through the off side as he comes down the track, played to the sweeper cover.
punches off the back foot to deep extra cover.
moves forward and pushes in the gap through cover for a single.
sweeps well from outside the off stump and through midwicket to the fence for a boundary, well played.
dabs it down to short third man.
moves back and punches through mid-off for a single.
comes forward and pushes it to leg side
fuller on the leg stump. Tamim comes forward and pushes it to leg side
short on the leg stump. Tamim crouches and sweeps it to deep midwicket for a couple
fuller, flighted delivery on the off stump. Tamim comes down the track and lofts it mightily over wide long-on for a six. That's the second of the innings for Tamim

one shot too many for Tamim! To a similar delivery as the previous ball, Tamim comes down the track and looks to go over long-on. He mistimes and lofts it to Mpofu at long-off. Price lets out cries of celebrations, Mpofu does the cycle-handle jig
fuller on the off stump. Comes forward and pushes it to the leg side
fuller outside the off stump. Raqibul drives it to long-on for a single
short ball outside the off stump. Junaid is surprised by the bounce as he defends it back onto the pitch
pushes it to long-off for a single
outside the off, Raqibul comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
comes forward and turns it to leg side
Price is giving it a lot more air now as Junaid freezes and defends it back onto the pitch
fuller outside the off stump. Junaid comes forward and looks to defend it. He is struck on the pads as they run across for a leg-bye. It would have hit the stumps but was pitching outside leg
good length ball on the middle stump. Raqibul comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
fuller outside the off stump. Raqibul comes forward and drives it to long-off for a single
short outside the off stump. Junaid punches it to extra-cover off the backfoot
fuller outside the off stump. Raqibul comes down the track and drives it to long-on for a single
fuller on the leg stump. Junaid pushes it to mid-on for a single
on the off and middle. Raqibul pushes it to leg side
outside the off stump. Raqibul pushes it to cover off the frontfoot
on the leg stump. Raqibul sweeps it to deep midwicket for a single
fuller on the middle stump. Junaid defends it to midwicket
defended down the track.
turned away to the onside.
uses his feet and drives bit uppishly past the bowler to long on.
punches off the back foot and down the ground to long off.
turned to square leg.
looking to come down the track, pushes through mid-on for a single.
down the track and driven along the ground to extra cover.
pushes to mid-on.
down the track to the pitch off the delivery and driven nicely in the gap to the left of mid-off to the fence, no catching that, it was well timed.
once again dances down the track and drives along the ground to long on.
defended to the onside.
tossed up delivery and Siddique swings it high in the air over the midwicket fence for a six. Just as Shamim Choudhary the commentator says no need of heorics, Siddique does it.
down the track and driven to mid-off, excellent fielding by the fielder diving to his right., coming in from extra cover.
defended.
punches it back to the bowler, Price trying to get under the skin of the batsman.
worked through the onside for a single.
turns it behind square leg.
played back down the track.
stands tall and plays to the onside.
works to the onside.
moves back and pushes to the off side.
flatter delivery outside the off stump, cuts and misses.
moves back and punches down the ground to long off.
pushed to the off side.
worked through the onside to the deep.
dances down the wicket and to the pitch off the ball and hits it high in the air wide of long on and one bounce to the fence.
down the wicket and drives down to long off.
moves forward and pushes to the onside to midwicket.
punches off the back foot to extra cover.
pushes to the off side.
pushes down the ground to long on.
plays to the onside to midwicket.
pushes it back down the track.
driven to extra cover.
moves back and turns it behind square leg.
pushes forward and gets the outside edge along the ground to short third man.
turned to fine leg for a single.
plays a flowing drive through the off side to the sweeper.
pushed back to the bowler.
punches it down the ground to long on.
driven down the ground past mid-on for a single.
flicks it behind square leg along the ground to the fence for a boundary. Siddique justs wants to finish this game off.
moves forward and drives to mid-on.
moves forward and drives down the ground to long on.
sweeps and misses, strikes the pad, appeal turned down.
played back down the track.
moves back and punches through extra cover.
moves forward and drives behind point.
turns it to deep backward square leg for a single.
punches it down the ground to long off.
driven to mid-off.
short ball, comes slowly off the track and Raqibul plays too early, goes for the pull and gets hit on the body.
punches it through extra cover to the deep.
fuller and driven back to the bowler.
off the pad to the onside.
turned away behind square leg to the deep and takes a single.
turns it forward of square leg.
quicker delivery down the leg side, signaled a wide.
driven back down the track to the bowler.
moves forward and drives to the onside.
turns it forward of square leg for a single.
pushes down to mid-on and looking for the single, sent back.
moves back and works through the vacant midwicket for a single.
tossed up fuller and driven down the ground to long on.
cuts straight to the fielder at point.
moves back and cuts to the sweeper.
moves forward and drives through mid-on for a single.
moves back and pushes down the ground to long off.
moves back and plays to cover, looking for the single, not there as the fielder is on to it.
works through midwicket for a single.
comes forward and defends to the onside.
uses his feet and looks to defend, gets a leading edge to the off side.
moves forward and drives, fielded well by the bowler.
down the track and pushes it back to the bowler.
opens the face off the bat and plays behind point.
moves forward and drives down the ground through mid-off.
turns it through square leg.
lovely shot, clips it wide of mid-on and the ball is racing along the ground to the fence and fielder desperately tries to pull it in but unable to do it, goes to the fence.
driven to the onside to mid-on.
plays with an angled bat behind point.
sweeps through square leg to the deep for a single.
pushes down the ground to long on.
uses his feet and pushes to extra cover.
turns away and plays with an angled bat to the off side.
sweeps from outside the off stump to deep backward square leg.
turns it to square leg.
uses his feet and drives through mid-off for a single.
50 for Siddique, punches it down the ground to long on for a single
uses his feet and pushes to the off side to extra cover.
arm ball and Raqibul pushes to the onside.
uses his feet and pushes to the off side.
down the leg side, tucks it fine to the fielder for a single.
slices it down to third man for a single.
defended with an angled bat behind the wicket on the off side.
pushes to the onside.
pushes to mid-off for a single.
slower delivery and Raqibul looking to drive through the off side, mistimes it.
spins down the leg side, signaled a wide.
moves back and plays to cover.
mistimes to cover.
down the track and drives along the ground to long on.
uses his feet and drives to the onside.
off the bat to short fine leg.

Price picks up a wicket out of the blue. Comes down the track and looks to go big through the onside, misses it completely and Taibu collects the ball and whips off the bails, Siddique was way outside the crease, had no chance to come back. He falls after a good knock.
outside the off stump and Raqibul slashes and misses.
fuller delivery pushed to mid-on.
played to the off side.
pushes to the onside.
width outside the off stump, cut hard behind point straight to the fielder.
lovely shot through the vacant off side to the cover fence, Shakib shows his class.
uses his feet and plays an inside out shot high in the air to deep extra cover, the fielder chasing could not get to it.
swept away nicely behind square leg to the fence for a boundary.
Price getting the treatment, sweeps forward this time through midwicket to the fence for a boundary, excellent batting this.
comes down the track and defends to the onside.
uses his feet and plays to the left of mid-off for a single.
lovely shot, moves back and cuts hard in the gap through extra cover to the fence for a boundary.
defended to the onside.
goes all the way, Raqibul is in a hurry, gets to his 50 in style, down the track and swings it high in the air over the midwicket fence for a six.
once again looking to go for the big shot, driven along the ground to extra cover.
cut to the sweeper for a single.
blocked on the track.
looking to play to the onside, gets a leading edge.
played back down the track
lovely shot from Raqibul, leans into the shot and drives along the ground and in the gap to the fence for a boundary.
another flowing drive through the off side, similar to the first boundary, Raqibul is firing away in style.
driven down the track past the bowler to long on for couple more.
slower delivery and well watched by Raqibul, who pushes gently to the off side and takes off for a single.
uses his feet and pushes down the ground to long on.
driven down the ground to long on for a single.

another batsman goes, Raqibul. Comes down the track and looks to loft it down the ground, gets an edge and goes to the keeper who gets rid of the stumps, Raqibul is way down the ground, thrown his wicket away.
too short from Dabengwa, who pulls it along the ground to wide long on.
off the pad to the onside.
looking for the pull, mistimes to mid-on.
stays in the crease and defends to the onside.
pulled along the ground to deep midwicket.
mistimes the drive to mid-off.
slower delivery and Mushfiqur blocks it down on the track.
cut straight to the fielder at point.
Mushfiqur Rahim finishes off in style by driving in the gap through the off side to the extra cover fence for a boundary.
